name: weathercast
description: This is a simple weather app that enables you get the average weather condition of a city by simply searching the city's name. This app is program to display the average weather data of the basic weather elements vis: temperature(in celsius and fareinheit), humidity and windsspeed(in km/h). Progressing, more features may be consider like ability to forecast weather for days, add more weather elements among other things to meet users need/demand.
